name: T-shirt
description: Comfortable cotton t-shirt, available in a range of colors and sizes.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and breathable, perfect for your daily jog.

name: Laptop Sleeve
description: Sleek and protective laptop sleeve, with a soft inner lining and water-resistant exterior.

name: Water Bottle
description: Durable and leak-proof water bottle, with a secure twist cap and wide mouth for easy filling.

name: Hiking Backpack
description: Spacious and rugged hiking backpack, with multiple compartments and adjustable straps for a comfortable fit.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable and waterproof Bluetooth speaker, with clear sound and easy-to-use controls.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: High-quality wireless earbuds, with noise-cancellation and a long battery life.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Thick and durable yoga mat, with a non-slip surface and easy-to-clean design.

name: Digital Camera
description: Compact and versatile digital camera, with high-resolution imaging and advanced features for professional-quality photos.

name: Electric Toothbrush
description: Powerful and effective electric toothbrush, with multiple modes and a long battery life.
